```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(survival)
```

```{r}
seer = read_csv("./SEER_RECODE.csv")

seer=
  seer|>
  janitor::clean_names()|>
  mutate(race_time = survival_month*race_c)
```
```{r}
ph_test = function(covariate){
cox_model= coxph(Surv(survival_month, death_s) ~ covariate, data = seer)

result = cox.zph(cox_model)

print(result)
}

```



```{r}
cox_model= coxph(Surv(survival_month, death_s) ~ persistent_poverty+sex+age_c+marital+race+rural, data =  seer)

result = cox.zph(cox_model)

print(result)
```
```{r}
cox_model= coxph(Surv(survival_month, death_s) ~ persistent_poverty+sex+age_c+marital+race_c+rural+race_time, data =  seer)

result = cox.zph(cox_model)

print(result)
```
